```{=html}
<body>
    <ul id="randomList">
        <li>Item 1</li>
        <li>Item 2</li>
        <li>Item 3</li>
        <li>Item 4</li>
        <li>Item 5</li>
    </ul>

    <script>
        document.addEventListener("DOMContentLoaded", function() {
            const list = document.getElementById("randomList");
            for (let i = list.children.length; i >= 0; i--) {
                list.appendChild(list.children[Math.random() * i | 0]);
            }
        });
    </script>
</body>
</html>
```
